participant_1.background:
I can be myself at work because my coworkers are all really accepting.
i like horseback riding.
I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax.
I like to eat food from my parents' home country.
summer is my favorite season.

participant_2.background:
I would like to be reincarnated as a tree to provide food for my family and the community.
i love to laugh.
i have two older brothers.
my husband is a pastor.
I love spending time with my dog, he is the best friend I could ever ask for.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi there! I love to laugh, I have two older brothers so I have learned to be a good sport!
That is awesome! I love to laugh too. What is your favorite type of food?
I love food from my parents' home country, it's really delicious!
That is awesome! What country is it from?
It's from China! Have you been there before?
No, I have not been there before but I would love to go one day!
You should! It's a beautiful country with a lot to offer.
I'm sure it is! I've heard great things about it.
I love summer! The weather is nice and I love being outdoors.
Me too! I love spending time at the beach with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love going to the beach too
